name: Through The HyperSpace
description:
// Objective of the game

Avoid touching the triangles and try to make it through the portals as quick as possible.

// Controls

W - Jump (You can jump mid-air)

A/D - Move left/right

Esc - Pause game (You can also use the pause button at the top of the screen)

// This game was made for Brackeys Game Jam 2023.1

// Development started on 15/2/2023
